subject: VAM PRO Motors not functioning - order no. 8206012768321664
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased 2 VAM Pro Motors for my pedals through aliexpress with
the same email as this. Upon connection I cannot get the haptics to
function at all. The test function does nothing. I have the updated control
box but still nothing no matter what plug hole I put them in. I'd like to
know what I should do next.

Best regards,
Byron.

conversations.body_text: Now after just trying to use my pedals they no longer function and are not detected in any Sim at all. I can see them registering in the manager software but they do not function in any game
